name: Sphere Game Epic
description:
Sphere Game Epic is the newest game of the "Sphere game" franchise with totally improved graphics and gameplay, pass the stage by controlling a lightly heavy sphere going through obstacles to earn coins and with new jumping and moving camera mechanics.

Features:

  • Camera with 3d perspective.
  • Skins for customizing the sphere.
  • Camera movement.
  • HDR.
  • Beautiful graphics.
